title: I have a hard time understanding Amazon Prime.
body:
Like the 2 day shipping shit. If I order something from some unknown place like Aoxinquji, and it would come by February 13th normally, how would they be able to ship it in 2 days?

I mean I'm not complaining, it just kinda confuses me how they can make 1+ month shipping and make it into 2 days.
